fields.description:
{html}

tableView (auto-height) rows with labels containing unicode characters seems to be calculating the height incorrectly.

I've noticed since a recent build of 1.3.0 that the rows seems to 'animate' to their required height as the table displays.

Some rows with unicode characters in the labels (with are themselves within a view within the row) do not appear to have the height set correctly.

This then manifests itself further with subsequent rows.
